title: Copper Fit Ankle Length Sport Socks
description: Each package contains 3 pairs of ankle length sport socks
Extra cushioning on the foot bed for supreme comfort
Make sure to order the right size - Small/Medium fits Men's shoe size 5-9 and Women's shoe size 6-10; Large/X-Large fits Men's shoe size 9-12 and Women's shoe size 10-13
Breathable, mesh venting keeps your feet cool
Heel tabs keep socks from slipping inside your shoe

Experience the benefits of a copper infused sock when you wear the Copper Fit Sport No Show Socks for your next workout. Made with high density activated copper woven into the fabric, these socks are naturally odor-resistant, extremely durable and made to withstand daily wear and use. With arch compression, a heel tab and moisture wicking material, you'll enjoy a secure breathable fit you can wear day after day.
